text: <@U026PHQ3J> Bonnie reported an issue with the set wallpaper dialog options being inconsistent to the options that appear in the device settings for wallpapers. I’ve done some poking around and I can’t find anything that might suggest that we have control over the options that appear in that dialog, but before I tell her that I wanted to check in with you. Do you know if we can change those settings to read ‘Home Screen’, ‘Lock Screen’, and ‘Both’?
we dont. so the real reason is that the first time you set it, you can choose, but subsequent changes to renderer doesn't trigger it because _you already made that choice_
if you think about it
cause
the first time you set it you're setting the "workshop wallpaper"
so it says "what do you want to do"
if you have it set, then switch to a different generator, it doesnt ask cause its not actually "setting the wallpaper"
we're just changing the renderer
I figured so much. Is there a way we can tell WallpaperManager to forget the previous setting options for Live Case?
i dont think so
the other option is to remove the dialog completely
cause i think we can tell it that we only support both
for example
Thanks for confirming that. I will let Bonnie know we can’t do anything about this.
<@U0U9WJB7F> Is it ok if I move this ticket to ‘Closed’ since there is nothing we can do about it? <https://uncorkedstudios.atlassian.net/browse/MLC-313>
cool thanks.
<@U1ZG1UCAK> i'm going to assign you some tickets to tackle before your last day!! :slightly_smiling_face:
okay!
<@U0U9WJB7F> FYI I worked out this issues that Bonnie reported with Artworks yesterday so I moved her tickets to ready for verification.
awesome thank you
